name: [GD] Microsoft Exchange Server UM Spawning Suspicious Processes
description: Identifies suspicious processes being spawned by the Microsoft Exchange Server Unified Messaging (UM) service. This activity has been observed exploiting CVE-2021-26857.
author: Elastic
Austin Songer
false_positives: Legitimate processes may be spawned from the Microsoft Exchange Server Unified Messaging (UM) service. If known processes are causing false positives, they can be exempted from the rule.
query:
process where event.type == "start" and
  process.parent.name : ("UMService.exe", "UMWorkerProcess.exe") and
    not process.name : ("werfault.exe", "wermgr.exe")
